html:
10.14.19  2:20 am   Where did you get those pants

     i got them at a thrift store, and i am donating them to another thrift store. and so the circle of life continues

10.14.19  1:23 am   Real question, I'm think about buying a MIDI keyboard/controller (I have a laptop that can act as a sound module), but I'm not sure what size to buy. Is 49 keys sufficient or should I go for 61?

     i've never tried 49. i had 25 for a while, which really wasn't enough room to roam, then i got 61 and felt much more comfortable. i wouldn't want 88, because that would be extremely heavy and a waste of space, in the room, it seems

10.14.19  1:07 am   hey steve, how did you climb that mountain?

     that's not my name, but it was written in the script

10.14.19  12:22 am   Can you give me the tabs for the bass rundown in la de da de da de da de day oh at the part when you're singing "it's the end of the world and I just can't wait"?

     i don't recall, but i can tell you you should try being on the C# on "can't"

10.14.19  12:18 am   what is a candle?

     like your own pet sun

10.13.19  11:37 pm   Have you ever looked at someone and wondered, "What is going on in their mind?"

     sort of, but then i realized that they might be wondering what's going on in someone else's mind. and so, the responsibility arises, to make sure i at least tend to my own mind somewhat

10.13.19  11:37 pm   what gave you nightmares as a child?

     adults

      what gives you nightmares now?

     children

10.13.19  11:35 pm   What is your favorite line from the movie The Room?

      bye

10.13.19  11:33 pm   heyyyyyy BILL! what was the last thing you ate today,

     a race horse!

      and why? 

      could be the winning one

10.13.19  11:14 pm   How long does it take for you to write a song

     maybe a day

10.13.19  10:36 pm   will you ever go to space? What would you do there?

     put some stuff there, try to fill it in a little

      Or more importantly have you already gone?

10.13.19  10:16 pm   what's the longest song you've ever written?

     here comes the sun, but that might have been mis-timed, and/or needs a re-write

10.13.19  10:09 pm   can i see some of your ties

     sure

10.13.19  9:50 pm   How many days on the countdown timer?

     it doesn't count days

10.13.19  9:48 pm   everyday the earth rotates, adding a day since you uploaded 'might quit'. and x amount of days remain until you upload the video, in 2019 or 2022.

     whichever video that may be, it may not be what you might think

10.13.19  8:51 pm   what isn't a video?

     2 seperate videos

10.13.19  8:50 pm   I had a dream where I was at a table with one acquaintance and a group of strangers. When conversation started. I don't know if I (un?)consciously did it, but I woke myself up, which I regret, as I would like to see what my dream strangers could tell me. What does this mean?  

     you are some kind of writer

10.13.19  8:45 pm   do you ever write a question on here and then answer it, making all of us readers think that one of us actually wrote it?

     no

10.13.19  8:33 pm   how do i stop having a bad day?

     start having a strange day. that day may be also bad, but it will lead to a good day after that

10.13.19  8:30 pm   I have social issues with people. How do i become confident? 

     work at a cash register for an extended period of time

10.13.19  8:25 pm   is your new song called penis racism

     no that's a song by one of my former colleagues who i am not on speaking terms with

10.13.19  7:53 pm   can you help me to stop getting distracted and actually do an important assignment?

     yes. first you need to explain the assignment. or if you can't explain it, start by explaining how unexplainable it is

10.13.19  7:50 pm   do you think it's possible to love someone but not like them?

     maybe

10.13.19  7:38 pm   are you successful?

     i'll see what i can do

10.13.19  7:35 pm   I want to sing but I can't sing? how do i make music sound nice?

     try this approach, take something visual, and see if you can use music to make it look nice

10.13.19  7:34 pm   why do drummers get such a bad rep?

     it only happens if they ruin the song, and then it gets worse with each additional thing they ruin

10.13.19  7:09 pm   could you drink a gallon of water a day

     yes, that's not even counting the one at night

10.13.19  6:10 pm   what song has shaped you the most

     it seems like it's an ongoing contest, to see which one can shape me more

10.13.19  6:06 pm   is this a rhetorical question?

     i see what you mean

10.13.19  5:53 pm   Will there come a time where you just put down your bass for good?

     i've hardly ever picked the damn thing up. it's too bad, there's lifetimes of fun on that thing

10.13.19  4:57 pm   so lately i've been feeling like life is meaningless and haven't been very motivated to do anything. do you ever feel this way?

     not since the great flood

      and if so, how to you get through it?

10.13.19  4:53 pm   we want a new video bill :(

     we understand

10.13.19  4:34 pm   How do you concentrate
I not able to for some time

     find the 'point' of the present scenario. in some cases, it may be behind you

10.13.19  4:05 pm   do your notes have colors

     i can make them that way

10.13.19  4:03 pm   Generaly speaking, how long does it take to make one of your songs/videos?

     1000 years

10.13.19  3:36 pm   do you ever cube?

     i am cubing my freakin brains out right now

10.13.19  3:20 pm   Have you considered acting?

     yes

10.13.19  3:00 pm   Will your machine help you take your animations to the next level?

     i'd say between 25 to 30 levels

      Did you realize this was the next necessary step after hotewig?

     no, after that point i realized the next step was to do a very large huge amount of songs, all with music videos. it was after that that i realized the next current step

10.13.19  2:52 pm   What's the best way to contemplate a single point in time and space? Psychedelics? What happens?

     if it's a single point in time and space, there is no better or worse way. there is only 1 way. hardly any way, really. very simple

10.13.19  2:40 pm   do like listening to your own songs? if not, why?

     probably a better idea to get working on the new one. because if i don't do it no one else will

10.13.19  2:02 pm   Why the umbrella and why not change it

     was thinking about making it a roof

10.13.19  1:21 pm   what are your videos about? I think they describe your life.

     they are mostly about loess

10.13.19  12:42 pm   How do you feel about Shrek? 

     not sure, never seen the movie, i just have all the shrek furniture

10.13.19  12:15 pm   i just stumbled here again and i would like to know your thoughts about black holes sucking gravity around 2mil kph idk, when will u have your next vid, people are wondering about u from the inet

     black holes seem pretty boring

10.13.19  12:08 pm   How do I keep going in this dreadful thing we call earth with all this politics, death, and possible meteors killing us all.

     it sounds like you may have been watching the 'news' channel(s). that sounds like the content they usually feature there

10.13.19  11:51 am   Do you ride a bike? 

     i can in the movies

10.13.19  11:51 am   where is the countdown timer at

     55

10.13.19  11:28 am   what if my free trial of existence expired

     you may have to live with a watermark of some kind

10.13.19  11:26 am   Does the time and date on these questions reflect the time they were asked according to your time zone, the time they were asked, or the time you answer them? Which one?

     time asked

10.13.19  11:26 am   do you ever try to imitate birds singing?

     sometimes, but maybe i should do it more

      it's fun
